original_text: And as they spake unto the people, the priests, and the captain of the temple, and the Sadducees, came upon them,
korean_text: 사도들이 백성에게 말할 때에 제사장들과 성전 맡은 자와 사두개인들이 이르러

sentences.original_text: And as they spake unto the people
the priests, and the captain of the temple, and the Sadducees
